Questions.Question: Who said, 'I can resist everything except temptation'?
Questions.Explanation: Oscar Wilde, the famous Irish writer, is known for his witty and humorous quotes.

Questions.Question: Which comedian said, 'I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals, I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants'?
Questions.Explanation: A. Whitney Brown, an American comedian, is known for his clever and sarcastic humor.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying'?
Questions.Explanation: Oscar Wilde's wit and humor are evident in this quote, showcasing his self-awareness and cleverness.

Questions.Question: Which comedian said, 'I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you'?
Questions.Explanation: Robin Williams, known for his improvisational skills, delivered this humorous line during his stand-up performances.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member'?
Questions.Explanation: Groucho Marx, a comedic legend, often used self-deprecating humor in his performances and writings.

Questions.Question: Which comedian said, 'I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens'?
Questions.Explanation: Woody Allen, known for his neurotic and self-deprecating humor, delivered this line in one of his films.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by'?
Questions.Explanation: Douglas Adams, the author of 'The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy,' had a humorous take on deadlines.

Questions.Question: Which comedian said, 'I'm not a complete idiot, some parts are missing'?
Questions.Explanation: This quote is often attributed to an unknown source, but it reflects the self-deprecating humor commonly used by comedians.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious'?
Questions.Explanation: This quote is from the character Michael Scott in the TV show 'The Office,' known for his humorous and awkward personality.

Questions.Question: Which comedian said, 'I'm not fat, I'm just easy to see'?
Questions.Explanation: Gabriel Iglesias, also known as Fluffy, often incorporates self-deprecating humor about his weight in his comedy routines.
